Introduction
This topic contains information on the various special purpose rating determinations in survivors benefits claims, including
special purpose determinations that
do not require a claim for survivors benefits
, and
require a claim for DIC
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 1  - Referral for Consideration of Survivor's Benefits
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section None
